PSCT.Base: Activate only when you take 1000 or more damage from your opponent's card effect: Place 1 Payback Counter on this card for every 1000 damage you took. During the End Phase of your opponent's next turn: Destroy this card, and if you do, inflict 2000 damage to your opponent for each Payback Counter on this card.
